  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.stellar.sdk.AllowTrustOperation
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by SetTrustlineFlagsOperation

    Represents AllowTrust operation.

    org.stellar.sdk.responses.effects.TrustlineAuthorizedEffectResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by TrustlineFlagsUpdatedEffectResponse

    Represents trustline_authorized effect response.

    org.stellar.sdk.responses.effects.TrustlineAuthorizedToMaintainLiabilitiesEffectResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by TrustlineFlagsUpdatedEffectResponse

    Represents trustline_authorized_to_maintain_liabilities effect response.

    org.stellar.sdk.responses.effects.TrustlineDeauthorizedEffectResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by TrustlineFlagsUpdatedEffectResponse

    Represents trustline_deauthorized effect response.

    org.stellar.sdk.responses.operations.AllowTrustOperationResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by SetTrustLineFlagsOperationResponse

    Represents AllowTrust operation response.

    org.stellar.sdk.Transaction.Builder
    will be removed in upcoming releases. Use TransactionBuilder instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.stellar.sdk.requests.OffersRequestBuilder.forAccount(String)
    Use OffersRequestBuilder.forSeller(java.lang.String) Builds request to GET /accounts/{account}/offers
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.AccountResponse.Signer.getAccountId()
    Use AccountResponse.Signer.getKey()
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.LedgerResponse.getTransactionCount()
    Will be removed in Horizon 0.17.0
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.operations.SetOptionsOperationResponse.getSigner()
    Use SetOptionsOperationResponse.getSignerKey()
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.RootResponse.getProtocolVersion()
    Will be removed in Horizon 0.17.0
    org.stellar.sdk.TransactionBuilder.addTimeBounds(TimeBounds)
    this method will be removed in upcoming releases, use addPreconditions() instead for more control over preconditions.
    org.stellar.sdk.TransactionBuilder.buildTimeBounds(long, long)
    org.stellar.sdk.TransactionBuilder.setTimeout(long)
    this method will be removed in upcoming releases, use addPreconditions() with TimeBound set instead for more control over preconditions.
    org.stellar.sdk.TransactionBuilder.setTimeout(BigInteger)
    this method will be removed in upcoming releases, use addPreconditions() with TimeBound set instead for more control over preconditions.
